name: Chaos Between Realms vr.0.1 (ByteOff Demo Update)
name_original: Chaos Between Realms vr.0.1 (ByteOff Demo Update)
description:
Hello everyone. So because we only had a month to develop a playable demo, there was some bugs that we couldn't attend to. Thanks to Dale Coop, a lot of those bugs are addressed. There may be some still lingering around but its much more playable than before. The warp glitch may still be in there. I haven't run into it so please, make sure to save often. 

The heroes sprites and animations along with most of the background assests have been updated.

Feel free to report any bugs you may find.
